about_the_game:
The male and female custom equipments, 6 set each, will become available for selection during custom character creation in "Edit Mode."

* Added Equipment
・Anointed Warrior Set （male）
・Anointed Amazon Set （female）
・Water God Rapids Set (male)
・Water Goddess Torrent Set (female)
・Elegant Swordsman Set (male)
・Elegant Swordswoman Set (female)
・Western Mechanical Set (male & female)
・Wandering Warrior Set (male & female)
・Courageous Officer Set (male)
・Battle Carapace Set (female)

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.
detailed_description:
The male and female custom equipments, 6 set each, will become available for selection during custom character creation in "Edit Mode."

* Added Equipment
・Anointed Warrior Set （male）
・Anointed Amazon Set （female）
・Water God Rapids Set (male)
・Water Goddess Torrent Set (female)
・Elegant Swordsman Set (male)
・Elegant Swordswoman Set (female)
・Western Mechanical Set (male & female)
・Wandering Warrior Set (male & female)
・Courageous Officer Set (male)
・Battle Carapace Set (female)

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core2 DUO 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 640*480 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core i7 860 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280*720 pixel over　※No 4K compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
